programme.title: The Beatles - Red Album
programme.desc: This authoritative critical review of the Red Album features insight, comment and analysis by Beatles insiders and experts. The film also features highlights from She Loves You and Please Please Me.

programme.desc: This is the long-awaited critical review of the classic line up of Argent in concert, on record and on film.

programme.title: Inside Cream
programme.desc: The first of the super groups, what made Cream such a success

programme.title: Black Sabbath, In Their Own Words
programme.desc: Drawing on archive film of Black Sabbath in performance, and first hand accounts from band members Glenn Hughes and Geezer Butler we strip away the veneer to see what made the band what they were.

programme.title: Bob Marley, Legend
programme.desc: This film comprehensively reviews the music, the circumstances surrounding its creation and the people behind Legend.

programme.desc: An introspective review of the Beach Boys Music presented by Graham McTavish.

programme.title: Robbie Williams Phenomenon
programme.desc: Featuring a wealth of rare interviews with Robbie and the reflections of a team of leading critics and working musicians, this penetrating critical analysis draws on rare archive footage.
